Name: Stalwart and True
Title: Dehya: Stalwart and True
Source: Reward for inviting Dehya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Stalwart and True
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1309]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1309] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13092]</color> once.
End Phase: If your $[A1309], who has this card equipped, has no more than 6 HP, heal that character for 2HP.
(You must have $[A1309] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
